tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Detroit man wins all the toys from carnival games prizes
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: For everyone who thinks carnival games are rigged, meet Peter Drakos the ringer. he is undoubtedly the best player in the world. A number of midways have put a limit on the number of prizes you can win thanks to Peter who is arguably the best in the world at carnival games. CBS News - www.cbsnews.com Read the story via - tinyurl.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Well, I believe he's also enjoying his﻿ life as well. Ever think of that?

if the man in this story sees this, Thank you. I worked for a theme park here in California and To see that even though you pay to﻿ play, you donate your winnings inspires me to try every day. I know I may not have much time left, but thank you. Thank You for all that you do. You are an inspiration. You are legion.
i wish i was half the man this man is. God bless him and those around him. ﻿ He has earned it.
hell yeah!﻿
I'd﻿ love to go to a fair where they have guitars as prizes 0:51
Good﻿ hearted citizen right there
Because he's the hero Carnivals deserve, but not the one they needs right now. So, they'll﻿ hunt him, because he can take it.
Plinkett:﻿ the later years
Boss alert.﻿
Get a Siberian husky he'll help you get rid of those toys.﻿

wow this man is a hero.. a true person with a soul in a society that lacks these characteristics today. I knew those games were rigged. Not the﻿ balloon and dart one though haha i always won that prize..
Faith in﻿ humanity somewhat restored
I get the feeling he would make a good spokesperson for﻿ space-saver vacuum bags.
Give﻿ them away, wow what a nice man
'win or lo' this dood﻿ can't lose..
Good guy :')﻿
Fck you dood with same comment 1 minute sooner...fck you﻿
PINK﻿
I never win shit @ those carnivals ;(﻿
Good guy﻿
i like how it cuts of at "win...or lo-...". HE DOESN'T LOSE﻿
Steve Hartman! "Everbody has﻿ a story". There's a whole series of these. Excellent reporter.
He's﻿ the G.O.A.T

Reviewer.Movies: Horror, Comedy, Action the best threesome
Reviewer.Music: Heavy Metal and other subgenres that go along with it

Pantera, Sepultura, Napalm Death, Slayer, Cannibal Corpse, Death, Autopsy, Mortician, Devourment, Neuraxis, The Faceless, Necrophagist, Nuclear Assault, Down, Kreator, Disembowelment, Winter, Funeral Mourning, Cephalotripsy, Blasphtized, Katalepsy, Kilte, etc...

Reviewer.Books: A Million Little Pieces, Tarzan of the Apes, Harry Potter Series, Bringing Down the House, The Lovely Bones, The Accidental Billionaires, Between a Rock and a Hard Place, Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close, Into the Wild, Twilight Series
Reviewer.Movies: Movies: Wedding Crashers, Just Go With It TV: Friends, Glee, House, It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia, cooking shows,
Reviewer.Music: Most anything...Michael Jackson, Bruno Mars, Christina Perri, B.o.B, Alex Goot, She & Him, Maroon 5, Goo Goo Dolls, Michael Buble, Katy Perry, Jack Johnson, Eminem
Reviewer.School: Case Western Reserve University, Saint Paul College
